title: Day 0 : Louie Vito's New Groove
description:
Halfpipe Snowboarder Louie Vito joins us as our first guest from inside the athlete villages in Beijing. In his second games with as many teams, Vito discusses traveling italian-style, being the old guys with Shaun White and why his opening ceremonies experiences are just as meaningful 12 years apart.

Follow In The Village an Amazon Music for an inside look at the athlete life in Beijing, and watch all the Olympic action unfold on the networks of NBC.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (Louie Vito)
